attributes.action: For leaders of the United Kingdom to call for a national day of prayer.
attributes.additional_details: Because we need help more than ever.
attributes.background: To announce to the nation for those of Christian faith to unite in a national day of prayer. To be led by our nation's Spiritual Leaders/Head of State or Government Leaders.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
